T04n849u_001:8: na bhāvo nāpyabhāvo'si nocchedo nāpi śāśvataḥ |
T04n849u_001:11: na pītaḥ śuklaḥ kṛṣṇo vā avarṇāya namo'stu te || 5 ||
T04n849u_001:12: na mahān nāpi hrasvo'si na dīrghaḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ |
T04n849u_001:14: na dūre nāpi vāsanne nākāśe nāpi vā kṣitau |
T04n849u_001:15: na saṃsāre na nirvāṇe asthitāya namo'stu te || 7 ||
T04n849u_001:17: parāṃ gambhīratāṃ prāpto gambhīrāya namo'stu te || 8 ||
T04n849u_001:18: evaṃ stute stuto bhūyādathavā kiṃ vata stutaḥ |
T04n849u_001:19: śūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu kaḥ stutaḥ kena vā stutaḥ || 9 ||
T04n849u_001:21: yasya nānto na madhyaṃ vā grāhyagrāho na vidyate || 10 ||
T04n849u_001:22: na gataṃ nāgataṃ stutvā sugataṃ gativarjitam |
T04n849u_001:23: tena puṇyena loko'yaṃ vrajatāṃ saugatīṃ gatim || 11 ||
